name: Orobas Devil
description: The Orobas Devil is a large fiend noted for its formidable presence, characterized by exceptional physical strength and resilience, and a mastery of fiery magic. It bears a cunning intellect, adorned with a shield and natural armor, giving it a fearsome appearance.
memorable: Its combination of high damage output, versatile attacks, and the ability to detect Celestials make it a unique and dangerous adversary.
goals: To deceive and destroy those who oppose it, particularly Celestial beings.
relations: May serve alongside other powerful fiends or sinister entities.
environment: Often found in hellish realms or locations of dark power.
strengths: Immunity to fire and poison damage, advantage on saving throws against spells, and a strong suite of skills in deception and insight.
weaknesses: Struggles against overwhelming magical power that can bypass its defenses.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack with a combination of melee and ranged attacks, including a powerful bite that inflicts piercing, fire, and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Hellish Weapons ability adds an extra 3d8 fire damage to its weapon attacks, increasing its lethality in combat.
equipment: Natural armor and magical weapon attacks.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 90 feet, allowing it to detect hidden foes and traps.
skills: Excels in skills such as Deception, Insight, and Perception, providing it with an advantageous position in social and observational scenarios.
additional_information: Can teleport up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space.
Advantage on Charisma (Deception) checks after casting a divination spell.
Restores strategic advantages with a reaction to gain advantage on ability checks or attacks.
spellcasting: Can cast spells like augury and guidance at will, enhancing its combat strategy and versatility.
test_queries: powerful devil with telepathy and truesight
large creature immune to fire and poison
